excerpts.title: Hey, I was reading that…
excerpts.body:
I’m a huge fan of web typography, but we’ll have to wait a bit longer to catch up with print.
Twitter surged last week with the news of Futura’s arrival at Typekit.

Futura PT’s classic design — tall ascenders, near perfect geometric shapes — make it both instantly recognizable and irrepressibly modern.

Indeed, and browser rendering makes it entirely unrecognisable. […]

excerpts.title: Simplicity in UI - IA Writer for Mac
excerpts.body:

It has all the designer’s preferred aesthetics. It’s minimalist, typography focused and beautifully simple.

excerpts.title: Designing a new me
excerpts.body:
I often say that aesthetics are the least important part of a website design.
Content and functionality are miles ahead of anything else. It’s obvious really, why would people visit unless you have some substance? They’re so important that design should focus on layout and architecture and only then should aesthetics be considered.
It’s refreshing!
